summary: A Soviet-trained assassin is determined to escape his double life as a hitman and as a husband-father.
cast: Dolph Lundgren|Stefanie von Pfetten|Samantha Ferris|David Lewis|Lindsay Maxwell|John Tench|Bo Svenson|Katelyn Mager|Monique Ganderton|Slavi Slavov|Stephen Chang|Igor Morozov|Mike Carpenter|Marian Koprada|Chantal Forde|Malcolm Stewart|Patricia Mayen-Salazar|Dan Payne|Charles Zuckermann|Patrick Sabongui|Douglas Chapman|Dave Hospes|Simon Burnett|Brad Loree|Colin Corrigan|Daniel Cudmore|Mike Ching|Lloyd Adams|Guy Bews|Layton Morrison|Rick Pearce|Mark Chin|Brett Chan|Aaron Au|Jeffery Aro|Don Lew|Taras Kostyuk|Ken Kirzinger|Dan Rizzuto|Paul Lazenby|Tony Morelli|Yves Cameron|Shawn Stewart|Mike Desabrais|Alexander Mandra|Richard Jollymore|Jessica Jaymes
title: Icarus
